title: Dagster Fundamentals Quiz
description: Test your understanding of Dagster's core concepts

questions.question: What is the primary building block in Dagster?
questions.explanation: Assets are the core building blocks in Dagster. They represent the data and ML models you want to exist in your system.

questions.question: In Dagster, you define HOW to compute data assets, not WHAT assets should exist.
questions.explanation: This is false. Dagster takes an asset-centric approach where you define WHAT data assets should exist, and Dagster handles the orchestration of HOW to compute them.

questions.question: Complete the code to create a basic Dagster asset:
questions.explanation: You need to import 'asset' from dagster and use the @asset decorator to define an asset.

questions.question: Which of the following are key features of Dagster? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: While Dagster can scale, automatic scaling to 1000+ nodes isn't a built-in feature. The other options are core features of Dagster.
